mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Achievement (title, category, abstract, detailedDescription, content, attachmentLink, creationTime, teamID, status, viewStatus) VALUES (#{title}, #{category}, #{abstractText}, #{detailedDescription}, #{content}, #{attachmentLink}, #{creationTime}, #{teamID}, #{status}, #{viewStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE Achievement SET title = #{title}, category = #{category}, abstract = #{abstractText}, detailedDescription = #{detailedDescription}, content = #{content}, attachmentLink = #{attachmentLink}, status = #{status}, viewStatus = #{viewStatus} WHERE achievementID = #{achievementID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Achievement WHERE teamID = #{teamID} ORDER BY creationTime DESC
